characters: Driver of a black SUV, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban highway. The road is relatively clear with moderate traffic. A black SUV is seen on the right side, and a white sedan is ahead in the adjacent lane. The vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position throughout the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position. The driver is cautious, keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead and to the right.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 2 meters away, maintaining its lane. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, driving steadily in the adjacent lane.
